mapper.select:
select A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_SJ , A.BOARD_CN , A.INQIRE_CO , A.CREAT_IP , A.NOTICE_AT , A.OTHBC_AT , A.use_AT , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID from BOARD A where A.USE_AT = 'Y'
-- 제목 검색 AND A.BOARD_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', '제목','%') and A.BOARD_CN like CONCAT('%','제목','%')
% + 변수명 + %
order by A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
